channel.description: Recent content in breaks on CINAQ

item.title: Reduce screen time as Developer
item.description: Developers spend countless hours in front of computer screens. The majority of professions today require interactions with computers. As if that’s not enough, it extends further into our private lives in this digital age. Even consumer products like iOS and Android devices have built-in metrics to keep track of your screen time. In this article, we explain why it’s essential to reduce screen time and give you ideas on how to do it as an IT engineer; and, in parallel, protect your eyes.
